alert.note: Alert for Eastern Grant; Eastern Mineral; Eastern Pendleton; Hampshire; Hardy; Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 4:38AM EST until January 16 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...In Virginia, Western Highland and Eastern Highland Counties. In West Virginia, Eastern Pendleton County. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is either ongoing or will begin shortly. The snow is expected to continue through the night, before winding down just prior to daybreak.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Grant; Eastern Mineral; Eastern Pendleton; Hampshire; Hardy; Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton
